client.title: Client settings
client.subtitle: Add here your client details given by your OpenID Connect provider. For further help, check the docs.
client.cert_path: Certificate path (in case of self-signed certificate)
client.skip_email_verified_check: Skip email verified claim check (useful for non-compliant providers that don't provide this claim, i.e. Casdoor)

settings.callback_subtitle: These are the callback URIs you need to register on your provider to get the client authorization code and to logout from provider as well, if the related option has been enabled.
settings.callback_logout_note: needed only when logging out from provider option is enabled (see at the bottom of the page)

provider.title: Provider settings
provider.subtitle: Add here your provider details. If your provider uses autodiscovery you're not required to add the endpoints and some other fields (you're free to override them if you want!). If your provider doesn't have implemented it yet, you can add the required settings manually below. Check the docs for further help
provider.response_type: Response type of provider to authorization

other.title: Other settings
other.provider_name: Name of the provider to display on OIDC-related buttons
other.manage_account_btn_open_in_new_tab: Open the account management page in a new tab
other.logout_from_provider: Logout from provider (when SSO mode is enabled)
